Description: 84 Lambda functions (83 API handlers + 1 Cognito Trigger) (Development)

Properties.Description: Get posts by a specific user
Get discovery feed with public posts
Get posts in a specific room
Get list of accounts a user is following
Get list of accounts following a user
Get list of accounts that liked a post
Get list of posts a user has liked
Get list of posts a user has reposted
Get list of accounts that reposted a post
Get analytics for a specific post
Get products tagged on a post
Join a live stream as viewer
Send a chat message during live stream
Get chat messages from live stream
Send a gift during live stream
Add a moderator to live stream
Ban a user from live stream
Cognito Post Confirmation Trigger - Create account in DynamoDB

BootstrapVersion.Description: Version of the CDK Bootstrap resources in this environment, automatically retrieved from SSM Parameter Store. [cdk:skip]

Assertions.AssertDescription: CDK bootstrap stack version 6 required. Please run 'cdk bootstrap' with a recent version of the CDK CLI.
